title: Print result of compound assignment - write code

content.prompt: Which of the following code segments can be used to print the output  2526?

choices.label:
int val = 5; 
val *= val;
System.out.print(val);
val++;
System.out.print(val);

int val = 5; 
val *= val;
System.out.print(val);
val *= 1;
System.out.print(val);

int val = 5; 
val += val;
System.out.print(val);
val++;
System.out.print(val);

int val = 5; 
val += val;
System.out.print(val);
val *= 1;
System.out.print(val);

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
